activities.loc: Branch 2 Courtroom, 2nd Floor, Oneida County Courthouse

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Kelli L St Germaine

2:37 PM Defendant Kelli L St Germaine appeared by video. Attorney Anne M. Katte in court for Kelli L St Germaine. Prosecuting attorney Michael William Schiek in court for the State of Wisconsin. Calling 21CF323, 21CF349, 22CF1 & 22CM39. In receipt of complaint, waive reading - not guilty plea in 22CM39. All cases to be set for pre-trial. Bail continued. Defendant to appear in person at next hearing. adj. 02:39 PM
Pre-trial conference scheduled for December 6, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

3:48 PM Defendant Kelli L St Germaine in court.  Prosecuting attorney Michael William Schiek in court for the State of Wisconsin. Calling 21CF323, 21CF349, 22CF1 and 22CM39. Court review of case. 22CM39 set for an adjourned initial appearance. Defendant states spoke to PD. Defendant to contact PD's office again to get attorney appointment. Bond continued. adj. 03:50 PM
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 3, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

2:13 PM Defendant Kelli L St Germaine appeared by video, in custody. Attorney Jillian Pfeifer in court for State of Wisconsin. Calling 22CM39, 21CF323, 21CF349 & 22CF1. 22CM39 set for an initial appearance.  Schiek/Defendant statement to counsel. Schiek states was sentenced in Vilas County last week. In receipt of complaint, right to counsel. Schiek statement to bail. Court sets bond 22CM39 and reinstates other bonds.. adj. 02:18 PM
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 26, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
